title: Samsung Galaxy S6 specs hinted by benchmark leak | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Samsung Galaxy S5tight]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * The benchmark also reveals a built-in storage capacity of 32GB, with 3GB ofRAM also packed inside.The Samsung Galaxy S6 camera is listed as 20-megapixel for the rear-facingshooter, while selfies look set to be captured by a 5-mexapixel snapper.All this runs off [Android 5.0Lollipop](https://www.trustedreviews.com/android-5-0-lollipop-review) – nosurprise there, as the [Samsung GalaxyS5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/samsung-galaxy-s5-review) has alreadystarted seeing the [Lollipop update inEurope](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s5-android-lollipop-rollout-begins-in-europe) just this week.What else do we know about the Samsung Galaxy S6? It’s whispered that thedevice is being built under a [‘Project Zero’codename](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-leaks-under-project-zero-codename), and could proffer design features borrowed from otherSammy handsets.Amongst these aesthetic options are the Galaxy Alpha’s metal trim, and theGalaxy Note Edge’s oddball [over-edge wrap-arounddisplay](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/samsung-galaxy-s6-might-land-with-double-edged-screen).We’re expecting the Samsung Galaxy S6 release date to fall some time betweenFebruary and April next year.**Read More:** [iPad Pro: Is it evenreal?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ipad-pro-12-9-release-date-concepts-stylus-specs-and-rumours)**Via:** [PhoneArena](http://www.phonearena.com/news/Alleged-Samsung-Galaxy-S6-SM-G925F-shows-up-on-AnTuTu-5.5-inch-Quad-HD-display-and-Android-Lollipop-included_id63523)
